channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: China’s Wild Panda Census is Widely Regarded as Flawed
item.description: The panda census methodology is widely seen as flawed, and China keeps the data shrouded in secrecy.

item.title: New Tennessee natural gas plant has permits for pipeline to fuel it paused on environmental worries

item.title: In Jordan, a ‘Stunning’ Discovery Under Petra’s Ancient Stone
item.description: A recent excavation has unearthed 12 human skeletons and a chamber of grave offerings near Petra’s Treasury building, a UNESCO World Heritage site.

item.title: The Brutal Reality of Panda Breeding

item.title: Lizzo, Cameron Diaz, and A.I.
item.description: Day 2 of the Fortune Most Powerful Women Summit.

item.title: This European city loved by British tourists bans night-time pub crawls in bid to attract ‘more cultured’ tourists
item.description: Prague has banned night-time pub crawls organized by travel agencies.

item.title: A 20-year-old founder’s color changing lip oil is blowing up TikTok
item.description: The up-and-coming BossUp brand draws inspiration from the likes of Rihanna and Selena Gomez
